cause.description:
He will stop global warming in the U.S. which in turn will make other countries like us again.
Also he will help the U.S. dollar go back up in value because he will help the U.S. lead in the Green House Market
1. Help make Al Gore run for President
2. Help get Al Gore elected for President
3. Help stop Global Warming
cause.mission: Get Al Gore elected for president
cause.name: AL Gore for President
